attributes.additional_details:
Angela Eagle has let Wallasey down for over 20 years now, its time the people of Wallasey rise up and do something about improving our area, and the first major step is the removal of Angela Eagle.
Angela Eagle has been elected for far to long and has failed to do anything with her time, surely this must be ammunition to stop her getting elected again. Even for Labour followers, she has seriously let down everybody in the area who care about Wallasey. It is time to give somebody else a go at restructuring Wallasey and somebody who is gonna care about what goes on around here.
